content: Good job @BWPanda (Peter) :+1:
being nosy, is that a custom template for the "header" block? its called block-system-header but its missing all the extra divs and cruft for slogan etc.

@docwilmot Nope, it's just the result of using a theme not based on Basis. Here's Backdrop's default header template: https://api.backdropcms.org/api/backdrop/core%21modules%21system%21templates%21header.tpl.php/1 and here's Basis' overridden one (adding more markup): https://api.backdropcms.org/api/backdrop/core%21themes%21basis%21templates%21header.tpl.php/1
Also, I just output the logo in that block, so that reduces the markup as per the system module's header template.
